did.unittitle: Miscellaneous - Russia - Two newspaper clippings by Percival P. Baxter (1931); Russia Today by Aaron Kopman (1927); The Big Smile: An Analysis of the Soviet "New Look" by Matthew Woll and Jay Lovestone (1955); Economic Review of the Soviet Union Vol. 5 No. 14-15, from the Amtorg Trading Corporation (1930); Proceedings of General Conference, August 1 and 2, 1930: The Internal and External Problems of Russia from the Institute of Politics in Williamstown, Massachusetts; The New Republic Vol. 70 No. 902 (1932); The New York Times Magazine (Nov. 30, 1930)
